alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 12:31PM CDT until August 07 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Jackson County in northeastern Alabama... Southeastern Franklin County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 115 PM CDT. * At 1230 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles north of Skyline, or 16 miles south of Winchester, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, Stevenson, Anderson, Hytop, Bass, Jericho, Russell Cave National Monument, Long Island and Higdon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
